snippet: A federal judicial panel denied Gov. Jerry Brown’s request to lift a court-ordered prison population cap.
abstract: Federal judicial panel denies California Gov Jerry Brown’s request to lift court-ordered prison population cap and threatens him and other state officials with contempt of court if they fail to comply by end of 2013.
lead_paragraph: A federal judicial panel denied Gov. Jerry Brown’s request to lift a court-ordered prison population cap.

headline.main: California: Court Orders Compliance on Prisons
headline.print_headline: California: Court Orders Compliance On Prisons
